verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During Monday night 's edition of The Late Show With Stephen Colbert] , [ARG0: host Stephen Colbert] [V: trashed] [ARG1: the Trump Administration 's policy of “ forcibly separating immigrant children from their parents] , ” [ARGM-ADV: comparing the policy to an “ all - baby reboot ” of “ The Shawshank Redemption] . ”

During Monday night 's edition of The Late Show With Stephen Colbert , host Stephen Colbert trashed the Trump Administration 's policy of “ [ARGM-MNR: forcibly] [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] , ” comparing the policy to an “ all - baby reboot ” of “ The Shawshank Redemption . ”
